protocol_name: The educational impact of mini-clinical evaluation exercise (Mini-CEX) and direct observation of performance (DOPS) and its association with implementation: a systematic review and meta-analysis
protocol_name_html: The educational impact of mini-clinical evaluation exercise (Mini-CEX) and direct observation of performance (DOPS) and its association with implementation: a systematic review and meta-analysis
description: This protocol describes the literature search for a systematic review on the educational impact of Mini-CEX and DOPS.
protocol_affiliation: Department of Assessment and Evaluation, Institute of Medical Education, University of Bern, Bern, Switzerland,FAIMER, Philadelphia, PA, USA,Department of Anaesthesiology and Pain Therapy, Bern University Hospital, University of Bern, Bern, Switzerland
manuscript_citation: Lörwald AC, Lahner F, Nouns ZM, Berendonk C, Norcini J, Greif R, Huwendiek S (2018) The educational impact of Mini-Clinical Evaluation Exercise (Mini-CEX) and Direct Observation of Procedural Skills (DOPS) and its association with implementation: A systematic review and meta-analysis. PLoS ONE 13(6): e0198009. doi: 10.1371/journal.pone.0198009
authors: Andrea C. Lörwald,Felicitas-Maria Lahner,Zineb M. Nouns,Christoph Berendonk,John Norcini,Robert Greif,Sören Huwendiek

authors_list.name: Andrea C. Lörwald
authors_list.affiliation: Department of Assessment and Evaluation, Institute of Medical Education, University of Bern, Bern, Switzerland

components.data:
FIRST SEARCH  
1. Search  
 Date of search  22.06.2015
Databases scopus, web of science, ovid (All Ovid Journals - Full Text & Abstracts,  Embase 1974 to 2015 June 05,  ERIC 1965 to March 2015,  Ovid MEDLINE(R) 1946 to May Week 5 2015,  PsycINFO1806 to June Week 1 2015)
   
1a) Search on Scopus  
Search terms 'mini-CEX' OR 'mini clinical evaluation exercise' OR 'direct observation of procedural skills' OR 'work based assessment' OR ' workplace based assessment'
Timeframe 2010-today (22.06.2015)
Number of hits revealed 290 hits
   
1b) Search on Web of science  
Databases all databases (NOTICE: Your organization does not receive data updates to the following database(s): Conference Proceedings Citation Index- Social Science & Humanities (CPCI-SSH); Conference Proceedings Citation Index- Science (CPCI-S).) 
Search terms 'mini-CEX' OR 'mini clinical evaluation exercise' OR 'direct observation of procedural skills' OR 'work based assessment' OR ' workplace based assessment'
Timeframe 2010-today (22.06.2015)
Number of hits revealed 270 hits
   
1c) Search on Ovid  
Databases All Ovid Journals - Full Text & Abstracts,  Embase 1974 to 2015 June 05,  ERIC 1965 to March 2015,  Ovid MEDLINE(R) 1946 to May Week 5 2015,  PsycINFO1806 to June Week 1 2015)
Search terms 'mini-CEX' OR 'mini clinical evaluation exercise' OR 'direct observation of procedural skills' OR 'work based assessment' OR ' workplace based assessment'
Timeframe 2010-today (22.06.2015)
Number of hits revealed 981 hits
Number of hits after deletion of duplicates 697 hits
   
   
2. Article selection  
   
hits of all data bases exportet to endnote library 1257 articles
duplicates deleted 803 remaining
deletion of articles without author or title 785 remaining
hits exportet into excel file  Excel sheet 'First search'
   
2a) First scanning round  
scanning by AL and FL independently Excel sheets 'Scanning Andrea' and 'Scanning Felicitas' and 'Comparison Scanning'
Selection criteria: Exclude publication, if 0 = formal criteria are not met (Title, Author) à  already excluded
  1 = Publication type is other than original research article (e.g. review article, commentary, letter, editorial, or abstract)
  2 = Sample population is other than medical trainees (e.g. nurses, osteopaths, chiropractors)
  3 = Topic is other than evaluating the educational impact of mini-CEX or DOPS (e.g. other aim of the study, other tools such as 360 degree feedback, Multi Source Feedback, feedback in general, team-CEX, peer-assessment are used)
  4 = Setting is other than real life clinical encounter (e.g. using  simulated patients or models, takes place in skills lab or OSCE…) 
  5 = Language is other than english or german
   
consensus Nr of articles excluded 729
   
2b) Article selection on full texts  
74 articles remain for full text analysis Excel sheets 'Full Text Andrea', 'Full Text Felicitas' and 'Comparison Full Text'
Selection criteria: Exclude publication, if 0 = formal criteria are not met (Title, Author) à  already excluded
  1 = Publication type is other than original research article (e.g. review article, commentary, letter, editorial, or abstract)
  2 = Sample population is other than medical trainees (e.g. nurses, osteopaths, chiropractors)
  3a = Intervention was other than mini-CEX or DOPS provided by medical experts in real life clinical encounters (e.g. mini-CEX or DOPS with feedback given by peer trainees or nurses, other tools such as 360 degree feedback),
  3b =Outcome resported was other than educational impact of Mini-CEX or DOPS
  4 / 5 = Language is other than english or german
   
65 articles excluded due to 1 article type = 42
  2 sample population = 1
  3a intervention = 5
  3b outcome = 15
  5 language = 2
9 articles included

hits of all data bases exportet to endnote library 1257 articles

scanning by AL and FL independently Excel sheets 'Scanning Andrea' and 'Scanning Felicitas' and 'Comparison Scanning'
Selection criteria: Exclude publication, if 0 = formal criteria are not met (Title, Author) à  already excluded

2b) Article selection on full texts  
74 articles remain for full text analysis Excel sheets 'Full Text Andrea', 'Full Text Felicitas' and 'Comparison Full Text'
Selection criteria: Exclude publication, if 0 = formal criteria are not met (Title, Author) à  already excluded
  1 = Publication type is other than original research article (e.g. review article, commentary, letter, editorial, or abstract)
  2 = Sample population is other than medical trainees (e.g. nurses, osteopaths, chiropractors)
  3a = Intervention was other than mini-CEX or DOPS provided by medical experts in real life clinical encounters (e.g. mini-CEX or DOPS with feedback given by peer trainees or nurses, other tools such as 360 degree feedback),

9 articles included

components.data:
ADDITIONAL SEARCH  
Date of search 24.11.2015
Search terms 'supervised learning event'  OR  'supervised learning events'
   
a) Search on Scopus  
10 hits  
5 hits not yet included in endnote database  
   
b) Search on Web of science  
6 hits  
3 hits not yet included in endnote database  
   
c) Search on Ovid  
33 hits  
12 hits until June 2015 are not yet included in our endnote database  
   
Deletion of duplicates leads to the addition of 12 hits  marked lilac in Excel sheets 'First search', 'Scanning Andrea', 'Scanning Felicitas'

components.data:
UPDATE  
Date of search 02.12.2016
   
a) Search on Scopus  
Search terms TITLE-ABS-KEY('mini-CEX' OR 'mini clinical evaluation exercise' OR 'direct observation of procedural skills' OR 'work based assessment' OR ' workplace based assessment' OR 'supervised learning event' OR 'supervised learning events')
Timeframe LIMIT-TO ( PUBYEAR ,  2016 )  OR  LIMIT-TO ( PUBYEAR ,  2015 )
Number of hits revealed 128 hits
   
b) Search on Web of Science  
Search terms TOPIC: ('mini-CEX' OR 'mini clinical evaluation exercise' OR 'direct observation of procedural skills' OR 'work based assessment' OR ' workplace based assessment' OR 'supervised learning event' OR 'supervised learning events')
Timeframe Timespan: 2015-2016. Indexes: SCI-EXPANDED, SSCI, A&HCI, CPCI-S, CPCI-SSH, ESCI.
Number of hits revealed 106 hits
   
c) Search on Ovid  
Databases  All Ovid Journals - Full Text & Abstracts,  Database Info Icon Embase 1974 to 2016 December 01,  Database Info Icon ERIC 1965 to October 2016,  Database Info Icon Ovid MEDLINE Epub Ahead of Print, In-Process & Other Non-Indexed Citations, Ovid MEDLINE(R) Daily and Ovid MEDLINE(R),  Database Info Icon PsycINFO 1806 to November Week 3 2016
Search terms Sichwort: 'mini-CEX' OR 'mini clinical evaluation exercise' OR 'direct observation of procedural skills' OR 'work based assessment' OR ' workplace based assessment' OR 'supervised learning event'  OR  'supervised learning events'
Timeframe 2015-current (02.12.2016)
Number of hits revealed 394 hits
Number of hits after deletion of duplicates 296 hits
   
   
Export to endnote library   
all hits 530
after deletion of duplicates 326
after deletion of references without author or title 321
after deletion of articles already included in systematic review (jan-july 2015) 249
   
Export of References from EndNote to Excel  
scanning by AL and FL independently excel sheets 'Update02.12.2016', Update Scanning Andrea', 'Update Scanning Felicitas', 'Update Comparison Scanning'
consensus Nr of articles excluded 242
7 articles remain for full text analysis Excel sheet 'Update Comparison Full Text'
3 articles excluded; 4 articles included from update

components.data:
RE-SEARCHING FROM 1995-2010  
Date of search 13.06.2017
   
a) Search on Web of Science  
Search terms TOPIC: ('mini-CEX' OR 'mini clinical evaluation exercise' OR 'direct observation of procedural skills' OR 'work based assessment' OR ' workplace based assessment' OR 'supervised learning event' OR 'supervised learning events')
Timeframe  1995-2010
Number of hits revealed 89 hits
   
b) Search on Scopus  
Search terms TITLE-ABS-KEY ( 'mini-CEX'  OR  'mini clinical evaluation exercise'  OR  'direct observation of procedural skills'  OR  'work based assessment'  OR  ' workplace based assessment'  OR  'supervised learning event'  OR  'supervised learning events' )  
Timeframe 1995-2010
Number of hits revealed 117 hits
   
c) Search on Ovid  
Search terms 'mini-CEX' or 'mini clinical evaluation exercise' or 'direct observation of procedural skills' or 'work based assessment' or 'workplace based assessment' or 'supervised learning event' or 'supervised learning events'
Timeframe limit to: 1995 - 2010
Number of hits revealed 533
Number of hits after deletion of duplicates 384
   
Export to endnote library   
number of hits in endnote library 766 articles
deduplicate in EndNote (after endnote algorithm find duplicates) 565 articles
deduplicate in EndNote (after hand searching) 517 articles left
Export of References from EndNote to Excel  
Transfer of 517 articles to excel excel sheets 're-search_scanning_FL', re-search scanning_AL' and ' re-search_comparison_AL_FL'
inclusion of 2 more articles (and the five articles which were already included in Miller and Archer, 2010)

components.data:
CHANGE OF SELECTION CRITERIA (POPULATION)  
Original Definition Sample population: Studies on medical trainnes are included. Studies on other health professions such as e.g. nurses, osteopaths, chiropractors are excuded.
New definition Sample population: All health professions (HP) are included.
Excel sheets 'HP-search', 'HP_update', HP_re-search', 'HP_summary'
Inclusion of 7 articles
